item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 18, 2024 06:02 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation
Skills: Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation
Country: United States

item.title: YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to join our team and assist in creating high-quality content for our YouTube channel. The primary task will be editing "how-to" videos, focusing mainly on cutting out pauses and ensuring smooth transitions.

Most of our video's are under 5 minutes long.

Job will be $10 usd per week (7 videos)

Responsibilities:

    Edit daily "how-to" videos to remove pauses and unnecessary segments.
    Ensure a polished and professional final product that aligns with the channel's style and quality standards.

Requirements:

    Strong attention to detail and ability to maintain high standards of quality.
    Good communication skills and ability to meet deadlines.
    Previous experience in editing YouTube videos or similar content is a plus.

Application Process:
Please submit your portfolio or samples of your previous work along with your application. We look forward to seeing your creativity and how you can contribute to our channel's growth!


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 18, 2024 05:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Kickstarter Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a captivating Kickstarter video using the footage that will be provided. We have the video that we would like the editor to imitate, along with the footage to create that video. Here is the link of the video we would like to imitate:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/rachaelclassi/tiny-spaces-a-dollhouse-that-converts-to-a-bookshelf/rewards?ref=section-design-tech-projectcollection-19-staff-picks-newest

It will be a ~3 minute video of 2 people talking and B-roll.

The video will be used to showcase our product and generate interest and support for our crowdfunding campaign. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing video footage and a creative eye for storytelling. The video should be engaging, visually appealing, and effectively communicate the key features and benefits of our product.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit and arrange video footage to create a compelling Kickstarter video
  - Incorporate text, graphics, and music to enhance the video's impact
  - Ensure the video aligns with our brand and campaign objectives

  Skills:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of visual storytelling and video composition
  - Ability to work with tight deadlines and deliver high-quality work

  If you are passionate about creating impactful videos and have a knack for storytelling, we would love to hear from you. Please provide samples of your previous work along with your application.

  Note: The footage will be provided, and the editor will need to work remotely.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 05:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Video Editor Needed for New YouTube Channel - Food and Japan Content Based - Upwork
item.description:
We are a new YouTube channel looking for a skilled and experienced Video Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in both long form and short form video editing. This is a great opportunity for someone looking for long-term work, as there is potential for continued collaboration based on the success of the channel.

We are launching 2 channels; one will be Japan content based work so more content creation based. The other being food based - specifically around ramen! We have a Cooking School (Baba Ramen) of which we teach people how to make ramen.

With this in mind, we will be posting across Instagram (primary medium for Baba Ramen) and YouTube for the Japan based content - channel will be called Japandy. My name is Andy and I am half Japanese so it's a play on words!

Responsibilities:
- Edit and assemble footage into high-quality videos
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects

Requirements:
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor
- Proficient in video editing software
- Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
- Excellent communication skills and able to be receive feedback  

We have a YouTube channel for Japandy that I had started for fun already, if you wanted to check that out to give you an idea around what the content might be around!

If you are passionate about video editing and want to be part of an exciting new venture, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 05:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Make a 30-60 Second Long App Demo Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented Video Producer to create a captivating 30-60 second video demo for our new app. The video should effectively showcase the app's features using the graphics from the TestFlight version, aiming to engage and excite potential users.

Key Responsibilities:

1) Graphic Utilization: Incorporate graphics from the TestFlight version of our app, enhancing them visually if necessary.

2) Video Production: Handle all aspects of video production, from editing to post-production, ensuring high-quality output.

3) Audio Integration: Select and integrate appropriate music, voiceovers, and sound effects to enhance the viewer's experience.

4) Feedback Implementation: Revise the video based on feedback from the project team to refine and improve the final product.

Budget: $600
Posted On: June 18, 2024 05:21 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Demo Video, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Demo Video, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: India

item.title: Producer-minded video editor needed for B2B agency - Upwork
item.description:
Everyone wants to go viral but us.  

Seriously.

Our clients are CEOs of B2B software offerings, and they don't need virality to scale.  Their average prospect is worth tens or hundreds of thousands to them, so their audience and leads are precious and few.  But we don't need to go viral to be a big success with these numbers.

We do however need help building the most professional remote-production B2B agency for YouTube Shorts, LinkedIn ghostwriting and video and point of view / opinion documentary.

Our company is named ANTEATER because more important than going viral is being consistent.  And just like the anteater that goes from one hill to the next very deliberate and slothly eating the ants, our clients are learning to be that consistent with content.

We offer b2b content in the style of YouTube Shorts, Youtube longer "talking head" videos, documentary and a variety of writing projects that support lead aquistion.

I'm hoping you are our next video producer.  Right now, the main skill we need is as an editor, but if you have experience as a producer, this will be a huge plus as you'll transiiton into running your own projects with us very quickly.

Right now this role is hourly, focused on creating a few youtube shorts from the raw footage we send (mostly podcast, style clips) but as we work together there will be opportunities to work on longer videos, meed with clients directly and even pitch ideas if you'd like to be involved there too.

Please send us a few examples of youtube shorts you've worked on.  preference going to of course, b2b examples, or explainer and learning videos, not so much the entertainment videos, skits, songs, etc.  We want some transferable stories that you've worked on as our clients would love help making software interesting :)

Hourly Range: $20.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 05:18 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Corporate Video, Testimonial Video, YouTube Video, Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Shorts
Skills: Corporate Video, Testimonial Video, YouTube Video, Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Shorts
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Fantastic and Talented Video Editor For YouTube Faceless Channel! 🎬✨ - Upwork
item.description:
Do you have a passion for editing faceless YouTube videos? Do you think creatively, out of the box and go the extra mile to deliver good and unique work?

As an experienced and driven video editor, you edit your videos with the highest possible quality! You are not easily satisfied and always strive to get the most out of your valuable talent. Do you have demonstrable experience editing outstanding YouTube videos? Then we are looking for you!

Here's what you like to do
- Using multiple editing styles to achieve outstanding results (high AVD videos)
- Instantly grabbing the viewer's attention
- Using real interviews/images
- You often change music and add music, sound effects in line with the story and feeling
- Working with adobe premiere pro, FinalCut and so on

You recognize yourself in this
- You always push yourself and deliver work you are truly proud of!
- You know better than anyone how to draw the viewer into the story through editing
- You are eager to learn
- You have proven experience in editing YouTube videos
- You communicate clearly
- You are able to work with tight deadlines

What else is important to know
- Montage of 8-10 minutes
- You will receive personal training to improve your skills
- Minimum of 3 videos per week, with the potential of 7 videos per week.

What else are you looking for in a job
- Money ;)
- Bonuses and profit sharing for excellent results
- Good working atmosphere
- Clear communication

What we pay
- $30 per video (bonus structure and profit sharing for excellent work)

Send your portfolio, together with your proposal and perhaps we will speak to each other soon!

Noaly Production

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 18, 2024 05:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Education, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Videography
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Education, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Videography
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
